articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: 'Sentient' brain cells in dish learn to play video game: study - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Brain cells living in a dish can learn to play the classic video game Pong, thus demonstrating "intelligent and sentient behavior," Australian neuroscientists argue in a new paper.
articles.content:
Brain cells living in a dish can learn to play the classic video game Pong, thus demonstrating "intelligent and sentient behavior," Australian neuroscientists argue in a new paper.

articles.title: Breast cancer metastasis: mapping long term outcomes in Australia - The Medical Journal of Australia
articles.description: Characterising the ongoing but changing risk of relapse after breast cancer diagnosis improves surveillance planning and patient care

articles.author: Mietta Adams
articles.title: Bougainville president accuses Richard Marles of making 'veiled threats' against independence aspirations - ABC News
articles.description: President Ishmael Toroama says Richard Marles's remarks after a visit to Papua New Guinea represent a change to Australia's neutral position.
articles.content: Bougainville President Ishmael Toroama has struck back at the Australian Defence Minister Richard Marles's comments in support of Papua New Guinea last week as an attack on Bougainville's aspirations… [+3119 chars]
